name: Shooting Sun
description:
THIS GAME WAS MADE FOR THE "WEEKLY GAME JAM 135"

SHOOTING SUN

I am a 13yo guy who recently started to make games in Unity and this is my third official release. I know this game needs lots of improvements, but given the deadline of the challenge this is all I could do. 

The idea of the game is very simple: you play as the Sun, your goal is to save Earth and destroy meteorites (or "shooting stars", the theme of the jam) using a gun that shoots smaller shooting stars. Sounds like a terrible idea? Yes, indeed.

HOW TO PLAY
  • Use W-A-S-D or arrow keys to move the player.
  • Use LMB to shoot at falling meteorites.
  • Don't let the World's health go 0.
  • Pickup the powerups that appear in the level.
  • Make the highest score you can reach.
CREDITS
  • Thanks to Evan King who made the music that I used in the game
  • Thanks to BFXR for the sound effects

(I apologize for bad english or bugs in the game but I'm italian and I'm a beginner, so please don't judge me)
